    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="build",
      defaultPhase=COMPILE)
public class BuildMojo
extends BaseBuildMojo
    Builds a Lime, OpenFL, or Feathers UI project.
    See Also:
    lime build command
